coursera.Title: Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning in Finance Specialization

coursera.Title: Overview of Advanced Methods of Reinforcement Learning in Finance
coursera.Short Intro: In the last course of our specialization, Overview of Advanced Methods of Reinforcement Learning in Finance, we will take a deeper look into topics discussed in our third course, Reinforcement Learning in Finance.
